meanings.definition: The correct or acceptable way of communicating on the internet.
meanings.sent1: Using good netiquette is important when sending emails.
meanings.sent2: She always follows netiquette when chatting in online forums.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed great netiquette by not interrupting the video call.
meanings.sent4: His netiquette was like a well-oiled machine, smoothly navigating the online world.
meanings.sent5: Learning netiquette is like learning to speak a new language online.

meanings.definition: The rules and conventions for polite and respectful online behavior.
meanings.sent1: Netiquette includes not using all caps in online conversations.
meanings.sent2: Students are taught netiquette to prevent cyberbullying.
meanings.sent3: The robot's netiquette was impeccable, always saying please and thank you.
meanings.sent4: Her netiquette was a shining beacon of online courtesy in a sea of rudeness.
meanings.sent5: Practicing good netiquette is like spreading kindness in the digital world.
